page.title: 15BRAHAM MILLAR FACTORY 2
page.content: Group as a whole as does the British Steel Corporation.The Strayfield Road factory has pattern shop facilities for single or multiple patternss in wood, resin or metal.The most popular piece of equipment is the Niagia screen but aa wide range of screens, bunkers, washer barrels, conveyors, feeders and associated supporting structures can be supplied to suit any site condition specified.No job is too large or too small; installations have been undertaken in the most difficult atmospheric conditions, ranging from the hotest to the wettest and the coldest parts of the world.To date the most expensive installation has been one in N. Ireland for a Â£1million + quarry installation which will process up to 560 tonnes per hour.Many of these large orders carry heavy penalty clauses so work is planned carefully
